tool_description: Sends automated notifications to customers about return status updates throughout the return process.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: return_authorized, shipping_label_ready, package_received, inspection_complete, refund_processed, return_rejected

notification_channels.description: Communication channels: email, sms, push_notification, in_app

additional_details.description: Additional context or details for the notification

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer not found or has no contact information.
Invalid notification type: Must be one of [return_authorized, shipping_label_ready, package_received, inspection_complete, refund_processed, return_rejected].
Invalid return authorization: Authorization number not found.
Unsupported notification channel: Must be one of [email, sms, push_notification, in_app].
Notification delivery failed: Unable to deliver notification through specified channels.
usage: Input customer_id, notification_type, and return_authorization_number. Optionally specify notification_channels array and additional_details for context.

delivery_status.description: Delivery status for each notification channel
